testcase.classname: Search and Place the Order for Products

testcase.system-out: Given user is on GreenKart landing page.....................................passed When user searched for short name Tom and extracted actual name of product..passed And added "2" items of the selected product to cart.........................passed Then user proceeds to Checkout and validate the Tom items in checkout page..passed And verify user has ability to enter promo code and place the order.........passed
